Why install Encryptor?

Easy-to-use and intuitive interface.
Generate ultra-secure passwords up to 100,000 characters in length.
Copy to clipboard functionality built-in for easy password use.
Choose from six variations to create your ideal password.
Regular updates and new features to enhance security.
Save your generated passwords and access them anytime.

Current Version: 1.0.2
